item.title: By: JCPC
item.dc:creator: JCPC
item.description: Wow! I love the waves in your hair. If I let my hair air dry, I look like an escapee from an insane asylum!
item.content:encoded: Wow! I love the waves in your hair. If I let my hair air dry, I look like an escapee from an insane asylum!

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper

item.description:
